title: Raleigh, rookie Wilson among All-Star starters
description: Mariners catcher Cal Raleigh, MLB's home run leader, and AL League Rookie of the Year candidate Jacob Wilson of the Athletics are among the All-Star Game starters.
author: Jesse Rogers

title: Sources: Ayton to sign 2-year deal with Lakers
description: Former No. 1 pick Deandre Ayton, who finalized a buyout with the Blazers on Sunday, will sign a two-year deal with the Lakers, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: Raducanu ready for Sabalenka after 'statement' win
description: After Emma Raducanu plays one of her best matches in "a long time", BBC Sport analyses how she can test world number one Aryna Sabalenka.

title: The most secure ton on record - breaking down Gill's masterclass
description: Why India captain Shubman Gill's innings was so special, how he repelled England's tactic of bowling straight and the legends he has bettered.

title: Draper cruises through at Wimbledon after opponent retires
description: Jack Draper was untroubled on his way to a place in the second round at Wimbledon as his opponent Sebastian Baez retired injured.

title: Verstappen open to joining Mercedes as talks intensify - Sky in Italy
description: Max Verstappen is open to leaving Red Bull to join Mercedes for the 2026 Formula 1 season with talks intensifying ahead of this weekend's British Grand Prix, according to Sky in Italy.

title: USMNT 2-1 Guatemala: Luna scores two more as Yanks reach Gold Cup final
description: The USMNT is two wins away from winning its 8th CONCACAF Gold Cup, which would put them just one behind Mexico for the most all time.

title: 2025 Indianapolis Colts roster preview: IDL Neville Gallimore
description: Let's take a closer look at this Indianapolis Colts team as we go player-by-player through the roster. Up next is free agent IDL Neville Gallimore.
